actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, to designate the Tenmile Recreation Management Area and Porcupine Gulch Protection Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rocky Mountain Recreation and Wilderness Preservation Act

titles.title: Rocky Mountain Recreation and Wilderness Preservation Act

To designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, to designate the Tenmile Recreation Management Area and Porcupine Gulch Protection Area, and for other purposes.
